message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"to open or turn on","sentence":"开电视。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image showing a simple room interior. On a table sits an old-fashioned TV. A person is pressing the 'on' button on the TV. Light glows from the TV screen, and the mood is calm, with muted, post-apocalyptic colors and gentle lighting.","sentence_translation":"Turn on the TV."}
